name: Mechamouse
description:
Project  realised in a school's gamejam. I worked on props and asset.

Your a robot mouse, that need to collect a lot of cheese to make the highest score. But beware the cat won't go easy on you.

PC  Movement "ZQSD" , Interactive "E", Boost "Shift" , Camera Movement "Mouse"

Gamepad -> Movement "Left Joystick", Interactive "A button", Boost "X Button", Camera Movement "Right Joystick "

We were a group of 10 people. A great experience
